examples.example: 今天去了一个特别好玩儿的地方，大家都玩得很开心。

translate.english: Went to a particularly fun place today and everyone had a great time.

examples.example: 周末我们一起去寻找好玩儿的地方放松心情。

translate.english: We will go together to look for interesting places to relax on the weekend.

examples.example: 这个游戏真好玩儿，让我沉浸其中，十分愉快。

translate.english: This game is really fun, making me immersed in it and very pleasant.
